headline: Revvity Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., October 23, 2025--The Board of Directors of Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.07 per share of common stock. This dividend is payable on February 6, 2026 to all shareholders of record at the close of business on January 16, 2026.

raw.headline: Revvity Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: WALTHAM, Mass., October 23, 2025--The Board of Directors of Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.07 per share of common stock. This dividend is payable on February 6, 2026 to all shareholders of record at the close of business on January 16, 2026.

headline: Will RVTY Q3 Earnings Reflect Segmental Strength Amid Rising Demand?
summary: RVTY's third-quarter results are likely to reflect strong performance in the Life Sciences segment. However, the Diagnostic segment is set to face challenges in China.
